resources.string: Enter a category to search by.
Enter as numbers and times in mins
Press button to select from your photos
Enter an address for an image on the internet
Deleting this ingredient cannot be undone are you sure you want to?
Deleting this step cannot be undone are you sure you want to?
Deleting this image cannot be undone are you sure you want to?
Deleting this keyword cannot be undone are you sure you want to?
Deleting this cook\'s note cannot be undone are you sure you want to?
Deleting this category cannot be undone are you sure you want to?
Deleting this recipe cannot be undone are you sure you want to?
Select a recipe to view recipe details.
Use the menu to manage categories, start entering a recipe, or view this screen.
For easy access you can add or delete categories in the category dropdown list through the menu.

You may filter the recipes based on the three dropdown lists with one filter selection per list. The filter will select all recipes that have any of the selected keywords, Meal, Protein and Category are not filters.
The menu is the same as the recipe list screen.

The content section displays the basic information of the recipe with labels. The servings are a number and the times are all in minutes. There is a place to add a personal note concerning the recipe in general.
The cook\'s notes are from the creator of the recipe.

The ingredients are listed in no particular order. They include an amount of the ingredient, the measure of the amount, the name of the ingredient. Any preparation of the ingredient will follow and there is a personal note concerning this ingredient.
The steps are listed in order to complete the recipe. Each step is numbered and that is followed by the instructions. There is a personal note concerning this step.
The images are shown and scroll horizontally.

Keywords are used on the filters on the Recipe List screen drop down lists. Any keyword that matches one of the three filters will make this recipe be listed when the filter is selected. If there are no keywords the recipe will only aooear when no filter is selected.
Press the floating edit button to show the recipe edit screen.
The menu is the same as the recipe list screen.
This screen lists the same information as the details screen with the addition of buttons.

The edit button across from Content will open a dialog box to edit or add all information in the content section. Submitting the dialog box will cause the changes to appear on this screen as well as being permanent in the recipe.

The add buttona will open a dialog box to add a new entry to the list following the heading. These items added will be at the end of the list except the step which is ordered by step number. If two steps have the same number the one created first will be listed first.

The icon buttons are edit and delete in that order. The edit button will open a dialog box to edit the contents of that item. The delete button will open a dialog box to confirm the deletion of that item. Both of these actions are permanent when submitted.

The (+ Gallery) and (+ Internet) will add images to the list of images. The gallery button will allow you to select an image from your photos and the internet button will allow you to select an image from the internet (right click (long press) on image and select image address paste address where the dialog box says Enter URL. Please make sure you follow all copyright laws
Images and keyword have no edit if you desire to change either of these delete the one to change and add the replacement.
The menu is the same as the recipe list screen.
The add recipe screen, which is accessed by the menu an any screen or the "ADD RECIPE" on the tool bar, will open a screen similar to the details screen with no information.

All buttons on this screen work the same as the Edit Details Screen with two exceptions. 1. The dialog boxes will have no data in them. 2. The submit buttons on the dialog boxes only put the information on this screen and will not save the information to a recipe.

The submit button will save the recipe and all information on this screen. You may use the submit button any time even on a blank recipe. It is recommended that you give the recipe a name so you can find it later and edit it to finish adding the recipe details.
It is possible to create multiple recipes with the same name. This could make it difficult to find the desired recipe. You can always use the Edit Details Screen to change one of the recipe names.
All dialogs are enter and submit what you want to add or change. No changes are saved until the submit button is selected. If in doubt you can submit and use the edit details screen to finish later.
All app actions are suspended while a dialog box is open, the submit button closes the dialog box.
Dialog boxes can be dismissed without making any changes by using the back button on your phone (if the keyboard is open you may have to hit back twice.
